description: Amateur web design and development as a hobby. Self-taught basic HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and image creation/editing in Adobe Photoshop.
Part-time/casual retail work experience at a small confectionery store and large supermarket.
Formal programming and web development studies at university graduating with a Bachelor of Information Technology and Systems/Bachelor of Arts double degree.
Internship working in the government doing data fixes in Oracle SQL and proprietary SAS programming language.
Small business client website project built in CakePHP and Bootstrap involving all phases of the SDLC from conception to delivery.
Professional full-stack web-development experience working at an eCommerce web development agency specialising in Magento.
Transition from fullstack to a frontend-focused position. React/Redux SPA development at an early-stage high social impact startup.

Studied a Master of Information Technology degree full-time.

Semester 1:

  • Usability Engineering
  • Algorithms and Analysis
  • Programming Internet of Things
  • IT Infrastructure and Security

Semester 2:

  • Big Data Processing
  • Cloud Computing
  • Software Testing
  • Software Engineering Project Management

Semester 3:

  • Advanced Professional Development
  • Practical Data Science with Python
  • Postgraduate Information Technology Project

Founding intern and later part-time frontend developer for an early-stage Silicon Valley-based tech startup while finishing off Master's degree. Currently full-time founding engineer specialising in frontend development.
